freeGeneration_uploaderDescription1: Image to edit or use as inspiration
freeGeneration_uploaderDescription2: Second image to combine or reference
freeGeneration_tips: No image input to use **Imagen**. The prompt will be intelligently analyzed for quantity and ratio.
Input an image to use **Gemini Image** (image editing).
When inputting multiple images, the main image should be the last one.
The main input image should be cropped to the desired output aspect ratio.
freeGeneration_promptPlaceholder: e.g., an astronaut cat skateboarding on Mars, oil painting style, create 4 images, 16:9 ratio...
freeGeneration_editModeWarning: Edit mode only creates 1 image at a time.
freeGeneration_aspectRatioNote: The closest supported aspect ratio will be used.
freeGeneration_regenDescription: Add a request to improve the image, or use it to create a video
